name: Through Rose-Colored Lenses
description:
Made in 2 days for the EGD Quarantine Jam

All art and main theme music by me (sorry)

Swap between looking at the world through a rose-colored lens, and being able to see the dangers of reality. But be careful: too much time seeing the world for what it is could make you too depressed to carry on.

Wearing your rose-colored glasses will keep you happy, but blind you to the danger around you. Taking off your glasses  will let you see the enemy, but keeping them off for too long is dangerous too.
